function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vector-borne diseases spread by ectoparasitic organisms on rats (e.g., Lyme disease, typhus, plague)","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission to humans and other animals","Mitigation":"Rat control measures, public awareness, and landscape management to reduce suitable habitat","Technologies":"Pest management technology, landscape architecture, and urban planning","People":"Urban residents, workers, and visitors, as well as pets and wildlife","Owner":"Local authorities, pest control agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increased asthma morbidity in inner-city children due to rat allergen sensitization and exposure","Impact":"Negative health outcomes for children living in urban areas","Mitigation":"Rat control, indoor environmental management, and public education on asthma triggers","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitoring, pest control methods, and health education programs","People":"Children, parents, healthcare providers, and educators","Owner":"Public health agencies, schools, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Potential contamination of urban bodies of water with infectious disease agents from rats (e.g., Campylobacter, Salmonella, E. coli)","Impact":"Health risks for individuals exposed to contaminated water","Mitigation":"Water quality management, rat control near water sources, and public awareness of waterborne pathogens","Technologies":"Water treatment systems, rodent control methods, and public health surveillance","People":"Recreational water users, wildlife, and domestic animals","Owner":"Environmental agencies, water management authorities, and public health departments"}]}
